mapper.sql: SELECT o.outcrop_id, o.name, o.outcrop_number, o.is_onshore, o.year FROM outcrop AS o
mapper.select:
SELECT ST_AsGeoJSON(q.geog, 5, 0) AS geojson FROM ( SELECT op.outcrop_id, po.geog FROM outcrop_point AS op JOIN point AS po ON po.point_id = op.point_id
UNION ALL
SELECT op.outcrop_id, pl.geog FROM outcrop_place AS op JOIN place AS pl ON pl.place_id = op.place_id WHERE pl.geog IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT op.outcrop_id, pl.geog FROM outcrop_plss AS op JOIN plss AS pl ON pl.plss_id = op.plss_id WHERE pl.geog IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT oq.outcrop_id, qu.geog FROM outcrop_quadrangle AS oq JOIN quadrangle AS qu ON qu.quadrangle_id = oq.quadrangle_id WHERE qu.geog IS NOT NULL ) AS q WHERE q.outcrop_id = #{outcrop_id} LIMIT 1
